posts.post_content: Good limited card. You have to remember that Wotc have to think of limited formats as well when they print a new set. I would never put this card in a constructed deck, but will draft it (later pick most likely) or use it if I open one in sealed.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: They had to be very careful with such a powerful ability; if you can make this ability recur somehow (like, using [Vedalken Mastermind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vedalken Mastermind)), you've basically locked your opponent down (they'll never draw anything but the creatures you bounced.) Still, it seems they were a bit too careful, because later they printed [Nevermaker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nevermaker), and it didn't break the game.
posts.html:
